entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Rain showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
